title: After threats to rip up the Brexit deal, UK and EU hold crunch talks
content:
1. After threats to rip up the Brexit deal, UK and EU hold crunch talks  CNBC
  2. Brexit: UK looks likely to trigger Article 16 - then what?  BBC News
  3. EU Considers Targeted Trade Action If UK Triggers Article 16  Bloomberg
  4. A Brexit trade war with the EU could backfire on Boris Johnson  The Guardian
  5. EU's Sefcovic welcomes "change in tone" from UK over N.Ireland trade talks  Reuters UK
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
After threats to rip up the Brexit deal, UK and EU hold crunch talks  CNBC
Brexit: UK looks likely to trigger Article 16 - then what?  BBC News

localize.title: ブレグジット協定を破棄すると脅された英国とEUが緊密な協議を行う
在威胁要撕毁脱欧协议后，英国和欧盟举行紧锣密鼓的会谈
在威脅要撕毀脫歐協議後，英國和歐盟舉行緊鑼密鼓的會談
